title: Assembly Script
content:
Hello, could anybody tell me what this font is? If it is indeed available as a font? I think it is because I'm fairly sure I've seen something similar used elsewhere?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022064345im_/http:/typophile.com/files/assembly_4064.gif)

Thanking you in advance!
